author: Andrew Hammond
title: Britain and the EU Put Off the Tough Questions
text:
The United Kingdom and European Union announced a provisional Brexit transition deal Monday. As important as the agreement could be, it avoids key disagreements, kicking the can down the road for what will be very difficult final settlement negotiations leading up to the U.K.â€™s scheduled exit around a year from now.

The deal will be considered at the European Council meeting of presidents and prime ministers this Thursday and Friday. It will come into effect only if London and Brussels resolve all divorce matters in coming...
